subject: Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Memphis Grizzlies’ new coach, Marc Iavaroni, vowed to return the sense of competition the team seems to have misplaced in a 22-60 season, the worst in the N.B.A.
snippet: The Memphis Grizzlies’ new coach, Marc Iavaroni, vowed to return the sense of competition the team seems to have misplaced in a 22-60 season, the worst in the N.B.A.
